“Hello there, stranger! Welcome to my site!!
My name is Adnan Hoq. I am a graduating senior at St. Joseph's College NY. I am a
student of mathematics and computer science. I am also an experienced full stack
developer and data analyst. At this moment, I am working on a research about
Blockchain Technologies in Student Recruitment. My current objective is to secure an
entry-level position as a full stack developer or a data analyst. My future
objectives include getting a P.h.D in Data Science, working as an accomplished
programmer for one the three big tech companies, creating my own startup, editing a
feature length Hollywood film; the list goes on and on! I am determined to get
most of the items on this list checked off before I'm 35. Aside from my academic
and professional pursuits, I frequently indulge myself in the art of filmmaking. I
like to explore and harness my skills and creativity as an amateur screenwriter
and editor every now and then. Additionally, I enjoy going to the arthouse
theaters and watching indie films.”
